name: Dreaming of the Cloaked King
description:
Title: Dreaming of the Cloaked King

Platform: HTML File

Genre: Text Adventure Game

Rating: T - contains violence and minimal blood

Target Market: Ages 13+

Game Overview: Travel to a fantasy realm by way of the Cloaked King and experience the story over and over to uncover more details.

Instructions: Download the file to play in your browser.

Game Design Team: Sarah Emmons
